post.summary: Get gets map of metrics names.

schema.description: FiltersRequest contains period for which we need filters.

FiltersReply is map of labels for given period by key.
Key is label's name and value is label's value and how many times it occur.

additionalProperties.description: ListLabels is list of label's values: duplicates are impossible.

items.description: Values is label values and main metric percent and per second.

post.summary: GetMetricsNames gets map of metrics names.

schema.description: ErrorResponse is a message returned on HTTP error.

post.summary: GetReport returns list of metrics group by queryid or other dimentions.

schema.description: ReportRequest defines filtering of metrics report for db server or other dimentions.

items.description: ReportMapFieldEntry allows to pass labels/dimentions in form like {"server": ["db1", "db2"...]}.

schema.description: ReportReply is list of reports per quieryids, hosts etc.

items.description: Row define metrics for selected dimention.

stats.description: Stat is statistics of specific metric.

items.description:
Point contains values that represents abscissa (time) and ordinate (volume etc.)
of every point in a coordinate system of Sparklines.

m_blk_read_time_sum_per_sec.description: Total time the statement spent reading blocks, in milliseconds (if track_io_timing is enabled, otherwise zero).

m_blk_write_time_sum_per_sec.description: Total time the statement spent writing blocks, in milliseconds (if track_io_timing is enabled, otherwise zero).

m_bytes_sent_sum_per_sec.description: The number of bytes sent to all clients.

m_docs_returned_sum_per_sec.description:
MongoDB metrics.

The number of returned documents.

m_filesort_on_disk_sum_per_sec.description: The filesort was performed on disk.

m_full_join_sum_per_sec.description: The query performed a full join (a join without indexes).

m_full_scan_sum_per_sec.description: The query performed a full table scan.

m_innodb_io_r_bytes_sum_per_sec.description: Similar to innodb_IO_r_ops, but the unit is bytes.

m_innodb_io_r_ops_sum_per_sec.description: Counts the number of page read operations scheduled.

m_innodb_io_r_wait_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long (in seconds) it took InnoDB to actually read the data from storage.

m_innodb_pages_distinct_sum_per_sec.description: Counts approximately the number of unique pages the query accessed.

m_innodb_queue_wait_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long (in seconds) the query spent either waiting to enter the InnoDB queue or inside that queue waiting for execution.

m_innodb_rec_lock_wait_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long (in seconds) the query waited for row locks.

m_local_blks_dirtied_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of local blocks dirtied by the statement.

m_local_blks_hit_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of local block cache hits by the statement.

m_local_blks_read_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of local blocks read by the statement.

m_local_blks_written_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of local blocks written by the statement.

m_lock_time_sum_per_sec.description: The time to acquire locks in seconds.

m_merge_passes_sum_per_sec.description: The number of merge passes that the sort algorithm has had to do.

m_no_good_index_used_sum_per_sec.description: The number of queries without good index.

m_no_index_used_sum_per_sec.description: The number of queries without index.

m_qc_hit_sum_per_sec.description:
Boolean metrics:
- *_sum_per_sec - how many times this matric was true.

Query Cache hits.

m_query_length_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long the query is.

m_query_time_sum_per_sec.description: The statement execution time in seconds.

m_response_length_sum_per_sec.description: The response length of the query result in bytes.

m_rows_affected_sum_per_sec.description: Number of rows changed - UPDATE, DELETE, INSERT.

m_rows_read_sum_per_sec.description: The number of rows read from tables.

m_rows_sent_sum_per_sec.description: The number of rows sent to the client.

m_select_full_range_join_sum_per_sec.description: The number of joins that used a range search on a reference table.

m_select_range_check_sum_per_sec.description: The number of joins without keys that check for key usage after each row.

m_select_range_sum_per_sec.description: The number of joins that used ranges on the first table.

m_shared_blks_dirtied_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of shared blocks dirtied by the statement.

m_shared_blks_hit_sum_per_sec.description:
PostgreSQL metrics.

Total number of shared block cache hits by the statement.

m_shared_blks_read_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of shared blocks read by the statement.

m_shared_blks_written_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of shared blocks written by the statement.

m_sort_range_sum_per_sec.description: The number of sorts that were done using ranges.

m_sort_scan_sum_per_sec.description: The number of sorts that were done by scanning the table.

m_temp_blks_read_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of temp blocks read by the statement.

m_temp_blks_written_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of temp blocks written by the statement.

m_tmp_disk_tables_sum_per_sec.description: Number of temporary tables created on disk for the query.

m_tmp_table_on_disk_sum_per_sec.description: The querys temporary table was stored on disk.

m_tmp_table_sizes_sum_per_sec.description: Total Size in bytes for all temporary tables used in the query.

m_tmp_table_sum_per_sec.description: The query created an implicit internal temporary table.

m_tmp_tables_sum_per_sec.description: Number of temporary tables created on memory for the query.

point.description: The serial number of the chart point from the largest time in the time interval to the lowest time in the time range.

timestamp.description: Time of point in format RFC3339.

schema.description: ErrorResponse is a message returned on HTTP error.

post.summary: GetLabels gets list of labels for object details.

schema.description:
ObjectDetailsLabelsRequest defines filtering of object detail's labels for specific value of
dimension (ex.: host=hostname1 or queryid=1D410B4BE5060972.
ObjectDetailsLabelsReply is a map of labels names as keys and labels values as a list.

additionalProperties.description: ListLabelValues is list of label's values.

schema.description: ErrorResponse is a message returned on HTTP error.

post.summary: GetMetrics gets map of metrics for specific filtering.

schema.description: MetricsRequest defines filtering of metrics for specific value of dimension (ex.: host=hostname1 or queryid=1D410B4BE5060972.

items.description: MapFieldEntry allows to pass labels/dimensions in form like {"server": ["db1", "db2"...]}.

schema.description: MetricsReply defines metrics for specific value of dimension (ex.: host=hostname1 or queryid=1D410B4BE5060972.

additionalProperties.description: MetricValues is statistics of specific metric.

items.description:
Point contains values that represents abscissa (time) and ordinate (volume etc.)
of every point in a coordinate system of Sparklines.

m_blk_write_time_sum_per_sec.description: Total time the statement spent writing blocks, in milliseconds (if track_io_timing is enabled, otherwise zero).

post.summary: GetQueryExample gets list of query examples.

schema.description:
QueryExampleRequest defines filtering of query examples for specific value of
dimension (ex.: host=hostname1 or queryid=1D410B4BE5060972.

items.description: MapFieldEntry allows to pass labels/dimensions in form like {"server": ["db1", "db2"...]}.
QueryExample shows query examples and their metrics.

example_format.description: ExampleFormat is format of query example: real or query without values.

example_type.description: ExampleType is a type of query example selected for this query class in given period of time.

schema.description: ErrorResponse is a message returned on HTTP error.
